description.text:
[url=https://zap-hosting.com/weakauras][img]https://screensaver01.zap-hosting.com/index.php/apps/files_sharing/publicpreview/FE97G8X3AZgiJx2?x=2548&y=941&a=true&file=banner%2520ad%25204k%25403x.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Donate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=paypal&color=007CB1[/img][/url]

This WA is a replacement of the DBM and BigWigs default timer bars, with lots of customization options.
You will still need either DBM or BigWigs installed for it to work. This WA simply hijacks DBM/BW timers and makes its own timers. 
Supports highlighting specific Alerts via replacing the text or adding TextColor/Glow while also giving you the ability to add "ticks" on the bar to more clearly put an emphasis on the abilitys that are about to happen within 5/10 seconds


[b][color=#ff0000][size=36]THERE IS NO USE IN ME ANSWERING "OH IT'S NOT WORKING" MESSAGES SO I WILL ONLY RESPOND TO THEM IF A BUGSACK MESSAGE IS INCLUDED!!!

FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question [/size][/color][/b]

Q: My BW bars sometimes keep showing eventhough i have "hide bw bars" enabled?
A: Sadly BW doesn't rly support hiding the bars properly the thing they want you to do is manually move the bars Anchor off screen. So i can either leave it in this semi working state or disable the option completly and have you moving the anchor off screen manually. If your bars keep showing you can always just move them off screen yourself.

Q: My DBM bars keep showing eventhough i have "hide dbm bars" enabled?
A: Using Addonskins together with that option will never work. Also make sure to /reload after updating the aura.

Q: I don't have cooldowntext on my icon like in the gif how do i fix?
A: You either go to the aura called "raid ability icon" there go to the display tab and check the box infront of the text that says %p or you use external addons like OmniCC or Elvui's Cooldown text

Q: Does this work in dungeons?
A: Yes. If your DBM or BW currently works in dungeons, then this WA will too.

Q: How to change the size of the icons
A: Display tab -> Icon size. 

Q: How to move text to the right side
A: go to display tab press the coghweel on text 1 and change this setting https://imgur.com/a/pI8FtIy

Q: Is there a way to make it horizontal instead of vertical?
A: The problem with lining up icons horizontally is that there wouldn't be enough room for the spell name text above/below each icon, since the text orientation is always horizontal as well.

Q: How do i get the Icons to look like in the Preview?
A: If you dislike the default look of icons there are various ways to get icons "skinned". Below are some options
[ol]
[li]Masque and skins like ElvUIesque or Flat Squares - https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/masque [/li]
[li]Clean Icons: Thin - https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/fileinfo.php?id=24559#info (This replaces art files and will apply to everything that uses the icon)[/li]
[li]Clean Icons: Mechagnome Edition -- (AI neural network image upscaling), bigger file sizes, but better image quality: https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25064-CleanIcons-MechagnomeEdition.html [/li]
[li]Simply use the Zoom setting in the WA Display tab (around 30% usually removes the ugly border)[/li]
[/ol]
Q: HALP! My DBM bars are gone forever after uninstalling this WA.
A: Paste the following macro into your chat /run DBT:ResetSkin() if that doesn't do the trick (which it should) go into WTF\Account\<Account #>\SavedVariables\ and delete DBM-StatusBarTimers.lua

Based on the very Popular [url=https://wago.io/B1pfxTOtb]Raid Ability Timeline[/url]
Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
This WA is a replacement of the DBM and BigWigs default timer bars, with lots of customization options. You will still need either DBM or BigWigs installed for it to work. This WA simply hijacks DBM/BW timers and makes its own timers. Supports highlighting specific Alerts via replacing the text or adding TextColor/Glow while also giving you the ability to add "ticks" on the bar to more clearly put an emphasis on the abilitys that are about to happen within 5/10 seconds THERE IS NO USE IN ME ANSWERING "OH IT'S NOT WORKING" MESSAGES SO I WILL ONLY RESPOND TO THEM IF A BUGSACK MESSAGE IS INCLUDED!!! FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question Q: My BW bars sometimes keep showing eventhough i have "hide bw bars" enabled? A: Sadly BW doesn't rly support hiding the bars properly the thing they want you to do is manually move the bars Anchor off screen. So i can either leave it in this semi working state or disable the option completly and have you moving the anchor off screen manually. If your bars keep showing you can always just move them off screen yourself. Q: My DBM bars keep showing eventhough i have "hide dbm bars" enabled? A: Using Addonskins together with that option will never work. Also make sure to /reload after updating the aura. Q: I don't have cooldowntext on my icon like in the gif how do i fix? A: You either go to the aura called "raid ability icon" there go to the display tab and check the box infront of the text that says %p or you use external addons like OmniCC or Elvui's Cooldown text Q: Does this work in dungeons? A: Yes. If your DBM or BW currently works in dungeons, then this WA will too. Q: How to change the size of the icons A: Display tab -> Icon size. Q: How to move text to the right side A: go to display tab press the coghweel on text 1 and change this setting https://imgur.com/a/pI8FtIy Q: Is there a way to make it horizontal instead of vertical? A: The problem with lining up icons horizontally is that there wouldn't be enough room for the spell name text above/below each icon, since the text orientation is always horizontal as well. Q: How do i get the Icons to look like in the Preview? A: If you dislike the default look of icons there are various ways to get icons "skinned". Below are some options
  1. Masque and skins like ElvUIesque or Flat Squares - https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/masque
  2. Clean Icons: Thin - https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/fileinfo.php?id=24559#info (This replaces art files and will apply to everything that uses the icon)
  3. Clean Icons: Mechagnome Edition -- (AI neural network image upscaling), bigger file sizes, but better image quality: https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info25064-CleanIcons-MechagnomeEdition.html
  4. Simply use the Zoom setting in the WA Display tab (around 30% usually removes the ugly border)
Q: HALP! My DBM bars are gone forever after uninstalling this WA. A: Paste the following macro into your chat /run DBT:ResetSkin() if that doesn't do the trick (which it should) go into WTF\Account\<Account #>\SavedVariables\ and delete DBM-StatusBarTimers.lua Based on the very Popular Raid Ability Timeline Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@tonyf4a[/taggeduser] Having the same issue, have you found any fix for it yet? This only happens in DoTI fall for me, the "Chrono-faded" icon drops to the bottom of the bar and then stays there forever.
[taggeduser]@Zerok004[/taggeduser] no this is a replacement for Bossmods bars and those bars do not interact with bossmods
Is it possible to have this import the bars from wago.io/dfdungeons?

[taggeduser]@Akulov[/taggeduser] private auras infiltrating was has been a trend we have observed. Noone knows why this happens yet thoug. If you can send me your saved variables that would help trying to narrow down the culprit of the issue. Either via discord or your prefered sharing platform Your installed auras can all be found at WTF\Account\<Account #>\SavedVariables\WeakAuras.lua
[taggeduser]@tonyf4a[/taggeduser] i havn't seen that myself while doing tons of dawn of the infinite keys so would need some way to reproduce thisto fix

https://imgur.com/a/XuJHM12
The WA icons breaks when I pick up a seed on Fyrakk. How to fix that?

Hello! having a issue with one specific ability (Chrono-faded) in dawn of the infinite getting "stuck" long after the boss is killed and combat has ended. Quickly opening up the WA settings seems to clear it out but it it always happens no matter what.
[taggeduser]@SirMiLky[/taggeduser] read the faq there is a screenshot included. (Press the gear to open the additional settings below the text)
[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] ty, one more question, how do you flip the WA so the texts are on the right side and not the left side. i can't find how to flip this.

Hey sorry to bother you. I have been using this weakaura (and its predecessors) for a long time, and it has always changed the text color of the ability name (text left of the icon) to whatever text color I have set in BigWigs. Since updating this weakaura today, it no longer does that for me. How do I get that back?
